channel.title: [PI] Wrong Item Slots
channel.description: Hello, I recently added the Vesta's set to my rsps client. I added the words into item.java and when I wear them, it goes into the wrong item slot. The weapon one to be specific. Please help.

item.title: [PI] Wrong Item Slots
item.dc:creator: @_Nathan1 $Nathan
item.description:
@_Nathan1 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Yesh. :3[/quote]Ty for your help :3.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Wrong Item Slots
item.dc:creator: @_Nathan1 $Nathan
item.description:
@_Nathan1 wrote:

				switch (wearID) {
					case 1052://Legends cape
						targetSlot = 1;
					break;
					case 13858:
						targetSlot = 4;
					break;
					case 13887://vesta chain
						targetSlot = 4;
					break;
					case 13861:
						targetSlot = 7;
					break;
					case 13879://Morrigans Jav
						targetSlot = 3;
					break;
					case 13883://Morrigans Axe
						targetSlot = 3;
					break;
					case 13870://Morrigans Top
						targetSlot = 4;
					break;
					case 13873://Morrigans Legs
						targetSlot = 7;
					break;
					case 13884://Statius Top
						targetSlot = 4;
					break;
					case 13890://Statius Legs
						targetSlot = 7;
					break;
					case 15038://Chaotic Longsword
						targetSlot = 3;
					break;
					case 15039://Chaotic Maul
						targetSlot = 3;
					break;
					case 15040://Chaotic Staff
						targetSlot = 3;
					break;
					case 13893://Vestas Legs
						targetSlot = 7;
					break;
					case 10386://Saradomin D'hide
						targetSlot = 4;
					break;
					case 10370://Zamorak D'hide
						targetSlot = 4;
					break;
					case 10378://guthix d'hide
						targetSlot = 4;
					break;
					case 10380://guthix D'hide chaps
						targetSlot = 7;
					break;
					case 10372://Zamorak D'hide
						targetSlot = 7;
					break;
					case 10388://saradomin chaps
						targetSlot = 7;
				
			}

You mean something like this?

item.title: [PI] Wrong Item Slots
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]^ that would go in the wearItem boolean.

Hats: targetSlot=0; Capes: targetSlot=1; Amulets: targetSlot=2; Weapons: targetSlot = 3; Bodys: targetSlot=4; Shields: targetSlot=5; Legs: targetSlot=7; Gloves: targetSlot=9; Boots: targetSlot=10; Rings: targetSlot=12; Arrows: targetSlot=13; [/quote]

Thank you for the list.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Wrong Item Slots
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Try using a switch statement, like so:

switch (wearID) { case 1: targetSlot = 0; break; }

you’ll have to to find the targetSlot id, however 0 is the helmet slot.

Read full topic
